Summary: Orange Light Moving/Flashing On and Off
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Evant
There were no other sightings in Evant on or around October 30th 2008
divs: sighting detailsrichard webb (mufon) and myself were at the firepit on the ranch where i work, about 60-70 miles south of stephenville, tx, watching for ufos. at 2050, we saw a very large orange light\object move through the sky from the west to east (roughly). the large orange light\object would flash on then off, each for an approximate duration of one second. this continued for about 20 seconds until the the light\object disappeared.
